value.name: Eyewitness News Anchor Aaron Wright now a father of two
value.description: KENS 5 Eyewitness News is sending a HUGE congratulations to Anchor Aaron Wright! As of Wednesday at 1:16 a.m., Wright is now a father of two! He and his wife welcomed Olive Caroline Wright into the world.

value.name: Violence Against Black Women Is Still Being Ignored and Forgotten
value.description: It would’ve had a wide selection of Black and African American history books, her friends say, and was supposed to be a testament to her love for the Black community. Another testament of that love was her participation in 2020’s summer of racial reckoning.

video.name: Toyin Salau’s Friends Won’t Let Her Be Forgotten

value.name: KENS 5 investigative reporter joining the San Antonio Police Department
value.description: "From there, I felt comfortable going to her for advice as I got my footing. Aaron Wright would also reach out to me after watching my stories with feedback on how it could have looked better ...

value.name: 'Black Lives Matter' and 'Defund the Police': The movements behind the messages | Together We Rise
value.description: SAN ANTONIO — Language is the starting point to communication and building a bridge to understanding. Last summer, we saw two groups standing apart on either side of protests for racial justice ...
